name: Project Dementia
description:
Project Dementia You are lost inside your mind You don't know what's around you Can you escape?

This is a tiny game I made during my first semester at Edinburgh College. The art style is inspired by Lucah: Born of a Dream.

CAUTION: This game contains quickly changing text, so it may disrupt people with photosensitive epilepsy

It is only a prototype, but I might add more levels and content if you enjoy the game , so please leave a comment!

The game was made using the Monogame framework, meaning that everything (including GUI) was made by me, so incase something breaks, there is a Settings.json file in the Content folder. Deleting this file will reset the settings and should fix any problems :)
